TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在方法中使用类 ，以便在执行任何使用 控件和业务对象的数据操作之后但在销毁业务对象之前，提供对业务对象实例的访问。The class is used in the method to provide access to the business object instance after any data operations that are using the control and business object are performed, but before the business object is destroyed. 使用属性访问业务对象 。The business object is accessed using the property. 通过添加委托来处理 事件，你可以访问业务对象的任何公开显示成员以执行任何最终工作或进行清理。By adding a delegate to handle the event, you can access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any final work or clean up. 如果执行数据操作的方法是方法，则控件不调用方法 `static` 。The method is not called by the control, if the method that performs data operations is a `static` method. 当该方法为静态时，不创建业务对象实例。No business object instance is created when the method is static. 控件公开了许多事件，您可以处理这些事件，以便在其生命周期中的不同时间使用基础业务对象。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle. 下表列出了事件以及关联的 类和事件处理程序委托。The following table lists the events and the associated classes and event handler delegates. |事件Event|EventArgsEventArgs|EventHandlerEventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |..

在创建业务对象的实例之前立即发生。Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.||| |..

在创建业务对象的实例之后立即发生。Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.||| |..

在检索数据之前发生。Occurs before the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

在执行插入、更新或删除操作之前发生。Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |

在检索数据后发生。Occurs after the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

完成插入、更新或删除操作后发生。Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.||| |..

在销毁业务对象之前发生。Occurs before a business object is destroyed.||| ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和控件结合使用 来显示信息。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例使用的中间层业务对象示例。The second code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the first code example uses. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和控件结合使用 来显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 使用的业务对象可能会消耗非常昂贵的 (时间或资源) 为网页执行的每个数据操作创建。You might work with a business object that is very expensive (in terms of time or resources) to create for every data operation that your Web page performs. 处理昂贵对象的一种方法是创建一次实例，然后将其缓存起来进行后续操作，而不是为每个数据操作创建并销毁它。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. 此示例演示了此模式。This example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以处理 事件以首先检查某个对象的缓存，然后创建实例（仅当尚未缓存某个实例时）。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and then create an instance, only if one is not already cached. 然后，处理 事件以便缓存业务对象以供将来使用，而不是将其销毁。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此示例中，将 对象的属性 设置为 `true` ，以指示 不调用 实例上的方法。In this example, the property of the object is set to `true`, to direct the to not call the method on the instance. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象示例。The following code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 此代码示例包含一个由类定义的基本业务对象，该类 `EmployeeLogic` 用于维护状态并封装业务逻辑。The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that maintains state and encapsulates business logic. 对于完整的工作示例，你必须将此代码编译为库，然后从 ASP 页中使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library, and then use these classes from an ASP page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/northwindemployee16.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/northwindemployee16.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象表示 控件用来执行数据操作的业务对象。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the business object with which the control performs data operations.

value.span: 用来执行数据操作的业务对象；否则，如果将 传递给 ，则为 。

span.span: The business object the uses to data operations; otherwise, , if is passed to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据操作方法 ( 、 、 和 ) 是实例方法，则在执行方法之前，会创建业务对象的实例。If the data operation methods (, , , and ) are instance methods, an instance of the business object is created before the method is executed. 您可以通过将对象保存在 事件处理程序的属性中来阻止为每个调用创建业务对象 。You can prevent the business object from being created for each call by saving the object in the property in the event handler. 在后续 事件中，可以从属性中检索业务对象 。In subsequent events, you can retrieve the business object from the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和控件结合使用 来显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 使用的业务对象可能会消耗非常昂贵的 (时间或资源) 为网页执行的每个数据操作创建。You might work with a business object that is very expensive (in terms of time or resources) to create for every data operation that your Web page performs. 处理昂贵对象的一种方法是创建一次实例，然后将其缓存起来进行后续操作，而不是为每个数据操作创建并销毁它。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. 此示例演示了此模式。This example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以处理 事件以首先检查某个对象的缓存，然后创建实例（仅当尚未缓存某个实例时）。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and then create an instance, only if one is not already cached. 然后，处理 事件以便缓存业务对象以供将来使用，而不是将其销毁。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此示例中， 类的属性 设置为 `true` ，以指示在 实例上不调用。In this example, the property of the class is set to `true`, to direct the to not call on the instance. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)]
